articles.author: Ferdinand Knapp, Elena Giordano
articles.title: Meloni fumes as EU top court makes it harder to reject asylum-seekers - politico.eu
articles.description: Italian PM accuses European judges of a power grab.
articles.content: Meloni called the court’s decision “surprising” and a power grab by EU judges. “Once again, the judiciary, this time at the European level, claims spaces that do not belong to it, in the face of resp… [+1249 chars]
